## builtin case spec

**.wasm* file of the case spec is generated by WABT's wasm2wat.

### builtin_puts_00001

```c
extern int puts(char *s);
int main(void)
{
  puts("hello deeplang\r\n");
  return 0;
}
```

```wasm
(module
  (type (;0;) (func (param i32) (result i32)))
  (type (;1;) (func (result i32)))
  (import "env" "puts" (func (;0;) (type 0)))
  (func (;1;) (type 1) (result i32)
    i32.const 16
    call 0
    drop
    i32.const 0)
  (table (;0;) 0 funcref)
  (memory (;0;) 1)
  (export "memory" (memory 0))
  (export "main" (func 1))
  (data (;0;) (i32.const 16) "hello deeplang\0d\0a\00"))

```

### builtin_puts_00002

```c
extern int puts(char *s);
extern int puti(int a);
int add(int a, int b)
{
  int c = a + b;
  return c;
}
int main(void)
{
  int res = add(7,8);
  puts("add(7,8)=");
  puti(res);
  return 0;
}
```

```wasm
(module
  (type (;0;) (func (param i32) (result i32)))
  (type (;1;) (func (param i32 i32) (result i32)))
  (type (;2;) (func (result i32)))
  (import "env" "puti" (func (;0;) (type 0)))
  (import "env" "puts" (func (;1;) (type 0)))
  (func (;2;) (type 1) (param i32 i32) (result i32)
    local.get 1
    local.get 0
    i32.add)
  (func (;3;) (type 2) (result i32)
    (local i32)
    i32.const 7
    i32.const 8
    call 2
    local.set 0
    i32.const 16
    call 1
    drop
    local.get 0
    call 0
    drop
    i32.const 0)
  (table (;0;) 0 funcref)
  (memory (;0;) 1)
  (export "memory" (memory 0))
  (export "add" (func 2))
  (export "main" (func 3))
  (data (;0;) (i32.const 16) "add(7,8)=\00"))
```

### builtin_puts_00003

```c
extern int puts(char *s);
extern int putf(float a);
float add(float a, float b)
{
  float c = a + b;
  return c;
}
int main(void)
{
  float res = add(7.1,8.2);
  puts("add(7.1,8.2)=");
  putf(res);
  return 0;
}
```

```wasm
(module
  (type (;0;) (func (param i32) (result i32)))
  (type (;1;) (func (param f32) (result i32)))
  (type (;2;) (func (param f32 f32) (result f32)))
  (type (;3;) (func (result i32)))
  (import "env" "putf" (func (;0;) (type 1)))
  (import "env" "puts" (func (;1;) (type 0)))
  (func (;2;) (type 2) (param f32 f32) (result f32)
    local.get 0
    local.get 1
    f32.add)
  (func (;3;) (type 3) (result i32)
    (local f32)
    f32.const 0x1.c66666p+2 (;=7.1;)
    f32.const 0x1.066666p+3 (;=8.2;)
    call 2
    local.set 0
    i32.const 16
    call 1
    drop
    local.get 0
    call 0
    drop
    i32.const 0)
  (table (;0;) 0 funcref)
  (memory (;0;) 1)
  (export "memory" (memory 0))
  (export "add" (func 2))
  (export "main" (func 3))
  (data (;0;) (i32.const 16) "add(7.1,8.2)=\00"))

```
